018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce;
019
020import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
021import static org.junit.Assert.assertFalse;
022import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
023import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
024
025import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.io.PrintStream;
028import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
029import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtil;
030import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ColumnFamilyDescriptor;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Table;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptor;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptorBuilder;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.LargeTests;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.MapReduceTests;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.LauncherSecurityManager;
040import org.junit.AfterClass;
041import org.junit.BeforeClass;
042import org.junit.ClassRule;
043import org.junit.Rule;
044import org.junit.Test;
045import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
046import org.junit.rules.TestName;
047
048/**
049 * Basic test for the CopyTable M/R tool
050 */
051@Category({ MapReduceTests.class, LargeTests.class })
052public class TestCopyTable extends CopyTableTestBase {
053
054  @ClassRule
055  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
056    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestCopyTable.class);
057
058  private static final HBaseTestingUtil TEST_UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtil();
059
060  @Rule
061  public TestName name = new TestName();
062
063  @BeforeClass
064  public static void beforeClass() throws Exception {
065    TEST_UTIL.startMiniCluster(3);
066  }
067
068  @AfterClass
069  public static void afterClass() throws Exception {
070    TEST_UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  protected Table createSourceTable(TableDescriptor desc) throws Exception {
075    return TEST_UTIL.createTable(desc, null);
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  protected Table createTargetTable(TableDescriptor desc) throws Exception {
080    return TEST_UTIL.createTable(desc, null);
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  protected void dropSourceTable(TableName tableName) throws Exception {
085    TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(tableName);
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  protected void dropTargetTable(TableName tableName) throws Exception {
090    TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(tableName);
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  protected String[] getPeerClusterOptions() throws Exception {
095    return new String[0];
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Simple end-to-end test
100   */
101  @Test
102  public void testCopyTable() throws Exception {
103    doCopyTableTest(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), false);
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Simple end-to-end test with bulkload.
108   */
109  @Test
110  public void testCopyTableWithBulkload() throws Exception {
111    doCopyTableTest(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), true);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Simple end-to-end test on table with MOB
116   */
117  @Test
118  public void testCopyTableWithMob() throws Exception {
119    doCopyTableTestWithMob(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), false);
120  }
121
122  /**
123   * Simple end-to-end test with bulkload on table with MOB.
124   */
125  @Test
126  public void testCopyTableWithBulkloadWithMob() throws Exception {
127    doCopyTableTestWithMob(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), true);
128  }
129
130  @Test
131  public void testStartStopRow() throws Exception {
132    testStartStopRow(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Test copy of table from sourceTable to targetTable all rows from family a
137   */
138  @Test
139  public void testRenameFamily() throws Exception {
140    testRenameFamily(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Test main method of CopyTable.
145   */
146  @Test
147  public void testMainMethod() throws Exception {
148    String[] emptyArgs = { "-h" };
149    PrintStream oldWriter = System.err;
150    ByteArrayOutputStream data = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
151    PrintStream writer = new PrintStream(data);
152    System.setErr(writer);
153    SecurityManager SECURITY_MANAGER = System.getSecurityManager();
154    LauncherSecurityManager newSecurityManager = new LauncherSecurityManager();
155    System.setSecurityManager(newSecurityManager);
156    try {
157      CopyTable.main(emptyArgs);
158      fail("should be exit");
159    } catch (SecurityException e) {
160      assertEquals(1, newSecurityManager.getExitCode());
161    } finally {
162      System.setErr(oldWriter);
163      System.setSecurityManager(SECURITY_MANAGER);
164    }
165    assertTrue(data.toString().contains("rs.class"));
166    // should print usage information
167    assertTrue(data.toString().contains("Usage:"));
168  }
169
170  private Table createTable(TableName tableName, byte[] family, boolean isMob) throws IOException {
171    if (isMob) {
172      ColumnFamilyDescriptor cfd = ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(family)
173        .setMobEnabled(true).setMobThreshold(1).build();
174      TableDescriptor desc =
175        TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(tableName).setColumnFamily(cfd).build();
176      return TEST_UTIL.createTable(desc, null);
177    } else {
178      return TEST_UTIL.createTable(tableName, family);
179    }
180  }
181
182  private void testCopyTableBySnapshot(String tablePrefix, boolean bulkLoad, boolean isMob)
183    throws Exception {
184    TableName table1 = TableName.valueOf(tablePrefix + 1);
185    TableName table2 = TableName.valueOf(tablePrefix + 2);
186    String snapshot = tablePrefix + "_snapshot";
187    try (Table t1 = createTable(table1, FAMILY_A, isMob);
188      Table t2 = createTable(table2, FAMILY_A, isMob)) {
189      loadData(t1, FAMILY_A, Bytes.toBytes("qualifier"));
190      TEST_UTIL.getAdmin().snapshot(snapshot, table1);
191      boolean success;
192      if (bulkLoad) {
193        success = runCopy(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(),
194          new String[] { "--snapshot", "--new.name=" + table2, "--bulkload", snapshot });
195      } else {
196        success = runCopy(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(),
197          new String[] { "--snapshot", "--new.name=" + table2, snapshot });
198      }
199      assertTrue(success);
200      verifyRows(t2, FAMILY_A, Bytes.toBytes("qualifier"));
201    } finally {
202      TEST_UTIL.getAdmin().deleteSnapshot(snapshot);
203      TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table1);
204      TEST_UTIL.deleteTable(table2);
205    }
206  }
207
208  @Test
209  public void testLoadingSnapshotToTable() throws Exception {
210    testCopyTableBySnapshot("testLoadingSnapshotToTable", false, false);
211  }
212
213  @Test
214  public void tsetLoadingSnapshotToMobTable() throws Exception {
215    testCopyTableBySnapshot("testLoadingSnapshotToMobTable", false, true);
216  }
217
218  @Test
219  public void testLoadingSnapshotAndBulkLoadToTable() throws Exception {
220    testCopyTableBySnapshot("testLoadingSnapshotAndBulkLoadToTable", true, false);
221  }
222
223  @Test
224  public void testLoadingSnapshotAndBulkLoadToMobTable() throws Exception {
225    testCopyTableBySnapshot("testLoadingSnapshotAndBulkLoadToMobTable", true, true);
226  }
227
228  @Test
229  public void testLoadingSnapshotWithoutSnapshotName() throws Exception {
230    assertFalse(runCopy(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), new String[] { "--snapshot" }));
231  }
232
233  @Test
234  public void testLoadingSnapshotWithoutDestTable() throws Exception {
235    assertFalse(
236      runCopy(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration(), new String[] { "--snapshot", "sourceSnapshotName" }));
237  }
